attributes.action: Stop trying to get the Theresa May’s Withdrawal Agreement through Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: This repeated stubbornness on the part of the Prime Minister is wasting valuable time which should be being spent exploring alternative possibilities for our leaving the EU. This is taking a toll on our economy and our global standing, with foreign leaders looking on with bemusement and ridicule as we flog this dead horse. Stop wasting our time.
attributes.background: Theresa May has finally succeeded in uniting Leavers and Remainers - against her deal. It has been rejected three times and to continue hammering it through is uniquely undemocratic and the British public do not want it. You lost, Theresa, get over it.
